text: Philip Andrew Gartside (April 1952 â€“ 10 February 2016) was an English businessman. He was born in Leigh, Lancashire. Gartside was chairman of Bolton Wanderers Football Club from 1999 through 2015. Gartside died in Cheshire from cancer on 10 February 2016. He was aged 63. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in England Category:English businesspeople
title: Phil Gartside
